user_instruction: 'Respond to the email from MedTech Solutions (feedback@medtechsolutions.com) with your thoughts on the patient profile management. You can check out my Gmail and NotionManager for information.'

formatted_items.content:
Subject: Quick Input Needed on MedTech’s Patient Profile Management

Hi Jane,

Could you please review MedTech Solutions’ current patient profile management workflow and share any thoughts or concerns you have—especially around data privacy, usability, or workflow fit for the clinic? MedTech is awaiting our consolidated feedback.

You’ll find the original email from feedback@medtechsolutions.com in the “Vendors/MedTech” Gmail label, and the latest feature notes are in the “Patient Profile Management” page on Notion. A brief bullet-point summary from you by tomorrow afternoon would be perfect so I can include it in our reply.

Thanks a lot for your help!

Best,
[Your Name]

final_output:
